_comment: SOTA: gateddeltanet --dim 512 --depth 4 --heads 8 --pooling last --patch_size 64 --weight_decay 0.0 --patch_embed_type causal_conv --augment --compile, 600 epochs, tested on LocD (tx 35-45, pkt 0-100). Set to best observed (84%); training is somewhat unstable (82-84% range).
notes: GatedDeltaNet SOTA: 84% accuracy on LocD dataset. Baseline range 82-84% due to training instability.
